name: diagram-chatgpt-plugin
description: Create Diagrams with Kroki, using Mermaid, GraphViz, Excalidraw, and more
author: InfoHazard Economist

scripts.dev: npm run build && miniflare --wrangler-config wrangler.local.toml --kv SHORTEN --kv-persist --modules build/index.js
scripts._comment: NOTE: Only use wrangler when deploying or testing in the cloud. Use miniflare for local development (npm run dev).
